item.title: Two examples of iteration with purrr - Class for the R-Studio certification
item.description: Certification I recently became certified as a R-Studio Tidyverse instructor. To pass the certification there are two exams, one specific a subject (such as Tidyverse or Shiny) and another one for teaching. In this blog I am going to share a 15 minute class that I prepared to pass the teaching exam. What to teach about? I use loops frecquently in for my work. I decided to look for two specific examples of functions in purrr package that could be motivating for the students.
